Order Information", "Contact Third-Party Sellers", "More in Managing Your Orders" ]; class AutocompletePage extends Component { state = { modal: false }; toggle = () => { this.setState({ modal: !this.state.modal }); }; handleModalClearClick = () => { this.setState({ modal: false }); }; logValue = value => { console.log(value); }; render() { const smallStyle = { fontSize: "0.8rem" }; return
